settings.title: Silver Reflective
settings.text: Also known as mirror tint, Chromoflex works by reflecting the solar energy before it transmits through the glass.

settings.title: Dual Reflective
settings.text: Dualflex's highly reflective outer layer reflects the heat while the inner layer offers maximum visibility. Available in a beautiful neutral gray color that is safe for all glass.

settings.title: Sputtered
settings.text: Sputterflex utilizes denser metals in the film to offer high heat reflectance that is available in a beautiful natural or bronze appearance.

settings.title: Safety & Security
settings.text: Available in two thicknesses, Safetyflex offers protection from broken glass hazards.

settings.title: Anti-Graffiti
settings.text: Vandalflex offers protection on glass from keying, graffiti, and tagging.

settings.title: Specialty
settings.text: Decorative films, such as white frost, white out, or black out, add privacy and style to any glass surface.
